text: Noe Balvin (born 2 November 1930) is a Colombian former sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre pistol event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Colombia Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Santander Department
title: Noe Balvin
